thread.section_title: Hotel de Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top location - Review
thread.title_full: Top location - Review of Hotel de Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Margofam
title: Top location - Review
text: Brilliant boutique hotel right next to Place Vendome (think Princess Diana and the Ritz). Stayed as family of 4 in superb suite. Loved the boutique feel - so much better than large chains. Lots of fancy stores around but equally amazing bakeries and Tuileries gardens just across the road. Would definitely stay again.
